page.title: 10Transport in Splott
page.content: {Transport:}When asked what type of transport people used in Splott the majority replied cars.However,over 50% said they used the bus service at one time or another. When asked about the state of the bus service ;90% said the buses were regular and on time,55% said the bus fares were too expensive;only 55% said that the buses were clean and comfortable. When asked if there were any improvements they would like to see in the city transport system the majority replied that they would like to see cleaner buses,10% thought that they needed someone to help the old people and mothers with little children, while the rest felt that no change was necessary.The majority said that they liked the driver only buses.
